title: 'Worst in Show' CES products include AI refrigerators, AI companions and AI doorbells
description: Artificial intelligence took center stage at this year's CES gadget show, but not always for the right reasons
content:

title: Meta’s Manus Deal Is a Win for the US
description: News that Meta Platforms Inc. will acquire Manus, a Chinese-born artificial intelligence startup that decamped to Singapore to court overseas capital and customers, landed as a surprise. The regulatory kerfuffle that followed didn’t.
content:

title: Ford introduces new system to support eyes-free driving
description: Ford Motor Co. says eyes-off and hands-off autonomous driving will be road-ready in 2028, and it'll introduce new artificial intelligence-powered features to its current customers starting this year.
content:
